Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan is in a must-win situation as they have yet to open their account in the competition and enter this match second-bottom in the Group A standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is part of the ICC T20 Cricket World Cup 2024, which is being held for the first time in the United States and the West Indies.
Others: The match will take place at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium on Tuesday, June 11, 2024, at 10:30 a.m. local time (ET). Fans in the United States and Canada can watch the match live on WillowTV.
